edu.hm.cs.se.game.app

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.hm.cs.se.game.app.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.util.Observable
    Master of the game. Manages game logic and state changes. Represents the interface to the view.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(GameBoard board)
      Initializes a new game and selects the first player.
